title: The Cowboy
description: Raelyn’s from the city… and well Brantley… he’s from the country. What could possibly happen? Well a crazy ex-girlfriend, a baseball bat, and sex. Yeah that’s what happens. That chance encounter after being bored nearly to death, and Raelyn finds herself driving home a lone country boy. She finds herself infatuated and head over heels. Then there’s Gina… Her best friend whom she so happened to leave back at the fairgrounds… Gina just so happens to be the cousin of the guy who’s house they were going to visit at for a week…
author: Kasey O'Grady
